title: rAja rAjagOpAla nanda yashOda
sahitya:
rAja rAjagOpAla nanda yashOda bAla rAjagOpAla navanIta lIlA prati jAgata


anupallavi

  sajjanAvana nipuNa sarasa madhurAnana shrI


caraNam    nIlamaya maIhAra nirupama suguNa sAra bAla nikhilAdhAra padma saurabha hAra
jAla jaladAkAra sharadindu mukha gambhIra campakavana haridrA taTa vihAra jAracOra
